message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this as a gesture of goodwill.
You were too generous in round 1. I'm not going to let you get away with that!
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  We both need to make something from this.

I think I'm getting a better sense of your negotiation style. You're willing to give me more than I initially offered you, but not as much as you initially offered me. I'll try to outdo you this time.
This is my final offer, Bob. We can keep going back and forth, but the money will keep shrinking. Let's find a compromise before it's too late.
